meanings.sent1: The military developed an antisatellite system to protect our communication satellites.
meanings.sent2: The country tested its new antisatellite technology to ensure it could defend against potential threats.
meanings.sent3: The antisatellite device was so advanced that it mistook a passing airplane for a satellite, causing a humorous mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The antisatellite capabilities of the new defense system were like a shield in the sky, ready to intercept any hostile actions.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the antisatellite equipment made it stand out against the dark backdrop of space.

meanings.definition: A weapon designed to destroy or disable satellites.
meanings.sent1: The military deployed an antisatellite to protect its vital communication network.
meanings.sent2: Countries around the world are developing more advanced antisatellites to safeguard their space assets.
meanings.sent3: During the training exercise, the antisatellite accidentally targeted an old, defunct satellite, causing a comical situation.
meanings.sent4: The antisatellite weapon was like a silent guardian in orbit, ready to neutralize any potential threats.
meanings.sent5: The launch of the antisatellite missile illuminated the night sky, showcasing the power of modern technology.
